entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
